original_text: Also the children of those that had been carried away, which were come out of the captivity, offered burnt offerings unto the God of Israel, twelve bullocks for all Israel, ninety and six rams, seventy and seven lambs, twelve he goats for a sin offering: all this was a burnt offering unto the Lord.
korean_text: 사로잡혔던 자의 자손 곧 이방에서 돌아온 자들이 이스라엘의 하나님께 번제를 드렸는데 이스라엘 전체를 위한 수송아지가 열두 마리요 또 숫양이 아흔여섯 마리요 어린 양이 일흔일곱 마리요 또 속죄제의 숫염소가 열두 마리니 모두 여호와께 드린 번제물이라

sentences.original_text: Also the children of those that had been carried away
which were come out of captivity
offered burnt offerings unto God of Israel

sentences.korean_translation: 온 이스라엘을 위해 수소 열두 마리

sentences.original_text: twelve he goats for a sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 죄를 위한 속죄제물로 숫염소 열두 마리였고

sentences.original_text: all this was a burnt offering unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 것이 주께 드리는 번제였더라
